channel.title: Resolution Problem
channel.description:
For some reason the mod won't detect up to 1600x900 resolution? I'm stuck on 1152xsomething or other?
It also has a greyed out box for DirectX 9 when looking at the advanced options.
Any idea what the story is?

item.title: Resolution Problem
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Greyed box is what it should be in Source engine. Make sure it lists DirectX v.9.x there in “Hardware Direct X version” and not 80/81. Read more on Source engine dxlevels in the sticky FAQ thread.

As for resolution - you could try adding “-width 1600 -height 900” to the startup parameters of the BMS and check if that helps.

Read full topic
